name: Evergreen Design Co Organic Cap
description:
Our 100% certified organic cotton twill cap is a primo peice. Featuring a 6 panel unstructured fit, matching sewn eyelets and underbill, fabric closure with sliding brass buckle and hidden tuck-in strap. Embroidery is in a complementary natural thread reading from the left front and across the side.

This item is shipped via USPS priority mail. If you require expedited service please email us at info@evergreendesignco.org. Bulk and custom orders are available- pleas einquire via email. For more pictures of this peice please visit evergreendesignco.org

name: Pinecone Coaster Set
description:
Printed on renewable cork, these coasters are where function meets style. Each set includes 4 coasters with the same pinceone print. Two coasters feature a bronze print, one is in gold and the last in copper. Each set comes tied in recycled string with a handwritten tag. Coasters are 1/8" thick. Screenprint is by hand with reclaim inks.

This item has been discontinued and availability is limited.

For more images please visit evergreendesignco.org. This product is shipped via USPS first class to keep shipping costs low. If you prefer expedited service please contact us via email at info@evergreendesignco.org for a quote.

name: Pinecone Shop Rags
description:
A timeless print for a timeless product.

Screenprinted with love using reclaim inks, these natural shop rags are ideal for a zillion household & workshop uses. Each set includes 4 rags- each featuring a different pinecone drawing. The set is tied with a strand of jute and makes a great gift for yourself or someone else.

Shop rags are shipped first class via USPS to keep shipping costs low. If you prefer faster service please email us for a quote. Bulk & custom orders available- please inquire via email. (info@evergreendesignco.org) For more images of this set please visit evergreendesignco.org.

name: Bicycle Shop Rags
description:
There's nothing better than an old fashioned shop rag... except, of course, a set of shop rags with awesome hand drawn bicycles on them!

Screenprinted with love using reclaim inks, these natural shop rags are perfect for any cyclist or bicycle fan. Each set includes 4 rags- each featuring a different design. The set is tied with a strand of jute and makes a great gift for yourself or someone else.

Shop rags are shipped first class via USPS to keep shipping costs low. If you prefer faster service please email us for a quote. Bulk & custom orders available- please inquire via email. (info@evergreendesignco.org)

name: Evergreen Mission Tee
description:
100% organic cotton tee printed with reclaim bronze and brown inks. All proceeds go towards the opening of Evergreen Design Center. Olive green tee- unisex (mens) sizing only. 

Specs: Medium is 40" chest and 29" long.
